black2_fla: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
black_fla: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
diamond_fla: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
emerald_fla: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun's rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
fire_fla: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
heart_fla: The seed on its back is filled with nutrients. The seed grows steadily larger as its body grows.
leaf_fla: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.
pearl_fla: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
plati_fla: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.

sap_fla: Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun's rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
soul_fla: It carries a seed on its back right from birth. As it grows older, the seed also grows larger.
white2_fla: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
white_fla: For some time after its birth, it grows by gaining nourishment from the seed on its back.
x_fla: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.
y_fla: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

black2_fla: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.
black_fla: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.
diamond_fla: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.
emerald_fla: To support its bulb, Ivysaur's legs grow sturdy. If it spends more time lying in the sunlight, the bud will soon bloom into a large flower.
fire_fla: There is a plant bulb on its back. When it absorbs nutrients, the bulb is said to blossom into a large flower.
heart_fla: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.
leaf_fla: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
pearl_fla: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.
plati_fla: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.
ruby_fla: There is a bud on this Pokémon's back. To support its weight, Ivysaur's legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it's a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
sap_fla: There is a bud on this Pokémon's back. To support its weight, Ivysaur's legs and trunk grow thick and strong. If it starts spending more time lying in the sunlight, it's a sign that the bud will bloom into a large flower soon.
soul_fla: If the bud on its back starts to smell sweet, it is evidence that the large flower will soon bloom.

white_fla: When the bud on its back starts swelling, a sweet aroma wafts to indicate the flower's coming bloom.
